entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:25 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
